mapper.select: select r2.* from user u left join user_role_relation urr on u.id = urr.user_id and u.is_deleted = 0 and urr.is_deleted = 0 left join role r on urr.role_id = r.id and urr.is_deleted = 0 and r.is_deleted = 0 and r.is_blocked = 0 -- 不关联禁用的角色 left join role_resource_relation rrr on r.id = rrr.role_id and r.is_deleted = 0 and rrr.is_deleted = 0 left join resource r2 on rrr.resource_id = r2.id and rrr.is_deleted = 0 and r2.is_deleted = 0 and r2.is_blocked = 0 -- 不关联禁用的资源 where u.id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and u.is_deleted = 0 and r2.id is not null order by r2.create_time
